mapper.select: SELECT BGNO, BGNAME, BGUSED, BGREPLY, BGREADONLY, BGNOTICE FROM TBL_BOARDGROUP WHERE BGDELETEFLAG='N' AND BGNO=#{bgno} AND BGUSED='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDLIKE , TB.USERNO, USERNM BRDWRITER, BGNAME, TB.BGNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) FILECNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(BRDNO),0)+1 FROM TBL_BOARD
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BGNO, BRDNO, BRDTITLE, USERNO, BRDMEMO, BRDNOTICE, BRDDATE, BRDDELETEFLAG, LASTDATE, LASTUSERNO) VALUES (#{bgno}, #{brdno}, #{brdtitle}, #{userno}, #{brdmemo}, #{brdnotice}, NOW(), 'N', NOW(), #{userno} )
mapper.select: SELECT BGNO, BRDNO, BRDTITLE, USERNM BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDNOTICE, BRDLIKE , DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, TB.USERNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT 1 FROM TBL_BOARDLIKE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND USERNO=#{field2}) BRDLIKECHK FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{field1}
SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno} AND USERNO=#{userno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDLIKE(BRDNO, USERNO, BLDATE) VALUES (#{field1}, #{field2}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} ORDER BY FILENO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDFILE (BRDNO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE) VALUES (#{parentPK}, #{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, DATE_FORMAT(REDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REDATE , REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.USERNO, CU.PHOTO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TBR.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY REORDER

SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, DATE_FORMAT(REDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') REDATE , REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.USERNO, CU.PHOTO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TBR.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REPARENT=#{reparent} AND RENO!=#{reparent} AND REDELETEFLAG='N'
SELECT RENO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno} AND USERNO=#{userno}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR1 INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR2 ON TBR2.BRDNO=TBR1.BRDNO AND TBR1.REORDER >TBR2.REORDER AND TBR1.REDELETEFLAG='N' SET TBR1.REORDER = TBR1.REORDER - 1 WHERE TBR2.RENO=#{reno}
